name: obsidian-gitpush
description: Pull and Push files from specified folders in Obsidian to specified GitHub repositories

scripts.test: node -e "const u=require('os').userInfo().username;if(u!=='johan'){console.error('Error: You should update your Obsidian vault path in package.json, and update username to match', u);process.exit(1)}" && node esbuild.config.mjs production && rsync -av --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.git' ./ ~/Library/Mobile\ Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/Perso/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-gitpush/ && echo 'Plugin copied to Obsidian vault'

author: JohanStickman
